docs.lead_paragraph: On July 10 President Nixon called for a campaign to solve a "massive crisis" in health care. He issued a "challenge" to the health insurance industry to find ways to cover more people and to change the benefit pattern in order "to provide incentives to keep people out of hospitals and other high-cost facilities."

headline.main: Medicine; Crisis Over the Cost of Health Insurance
